column4: Traffic;Phnom Penh:------  At 3:30 am on October 6
column6: a young man passed out of train tracks after drinking.------A train came along at the spot in Chong Thnal West Village
column8: Khan Sen Sok and ran over the man’s legs.------The victim
column10: rented a room near Chinnan Market in Teuk Thla commune
column11: Sen Sok district. He is from  Svay Rieng.------Before the incident
column12: the victim finished work and went to a drink at the home of a friend
column13: and later left for home. The victim did not return
column14: having fallen down on the tracks.------Both his legs were cut off by the train. The man was taken to hospital.------Photos:------rasmeinews (nasty)------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/264086
